message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. Let me know if you're willing to meet me halfway!

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment. What do you say?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. Let me know if you're willing to meet me halfway again!

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $10,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,500 as a final concession. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your investment. Let's close this deal!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,500, but I'm still not quite there. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. Let me know if you're willing to meet me halfway again!

Bob, I see you're determined to get a good price, and I respect that.  However, $10,800 is still too low for me.  I'm willing to go down to $11,200 as my final offer. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you won't regret it.  Let's close this deal!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,200, but I'm still not quite there. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10,900. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. Let me know if you're willing to meet me halfway again!
